objects.text: Exquisite Pink Drop Design • Genuine GIVA Jewellery
Certificate of Authenticity • 925 Stamp • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a pair of elegant rose gold wreath stud earrings. At the top, two prominent text layers—`heading` and `subheading`—announce the product name in a stylish serif font, exuding luxury. The `tagline` below highlights material sophistication. The center features a detailed jewelry graphic (`product_image`) placed on a soft radial pink background composed of a layered SVG with subtle gradients and circular blur effects, creating depth and focus.

Two informational text layers—`description_1` and `description_2`—convey quality and authenticity below the product. The `price` is highlighted in large bold typography. A contrasting dark button (`cta_background`) encloses the `cta` text prompting action.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Gold: #913A3A / #A05454 / #813131
- Background Blush: #FFF5F5 / #FFDADA / #FFBDBD / #E8A9A9 / #C66E6E
- CTA Button: #913A3A
- Text (Body): #813131, #A05454
- White Accent: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a soft and luxurious color palette. Dominated by a rose gold metal frame (#EFA8A4), the design blends beautifully with blush pink enamel teardrop accents (#FAD4DA), evoking a feminine and delicate appeal. The embedded clear white gemstones (#F3F3F3) add sparkle and contrast, enhancing the brilliance of the overall composition. These gemstones reflect light, harmoniously blending with the peachy rose tones while standing out. A balanced banner can use these primary colors: Rose Gold (#EFA8A4), Blush Pink (#FAD4DA), Crystal White (#F3F3F3), and Highlight Silver (#DADADA) for elegance and refinement.
